General.Name: Shandong Liancheng Precision Manufacturing Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shandong Liancheng Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, design, production, and sales of various precision mechanical parts in China. The company manufactures metal components and metal parts through casting and machining. Its precision mechanical parts, including hydraulic travel motor housing/rear end cover, reducer housing, hydraulic valve seat, crankcase body, crankshaft cover, bearing seat, suspension bracket, damping wheel/ring, shock absorber parts housings, automobile water pump housings, etc. The company's products are used in commercial vehicles, construction machinery, agricultural machinery, passenger cars, diesel engines, commercial compressors, hydraulic machinery, solar thermal power generation, environmental protection, water treatment, high-speed rail, and other industries. It also exports its products to North America, South America, Europe, Asia, the Oceania, and internationally. Shandong Liancheng Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jining, China.
